title: Spin, spin, spin, spin, spin to win: One For All returns

replies.body: Looks great! i have tried it and i can say that is really a good help, mostly for players who dont have all champs yet {{champion:223}}

kindred 7800 ip? no.
kindfred free? yes.

:)
this saved me so much money i'd else spent on rp lol
Make URF + One For All a game mode.
No URF and Doom Bots
the morg bots would wreck everyone o.o
That needs to happen

One For All Must Stay! 

<3 the tahm kenchs! {{champion:223}}
why cant this mode be kept ;n;{{item:3151}}
{{champion:245}} should be {{champion:26}} grandson

I think allowing the two teams to be different is causing the potential for a severe imbalance. I started just after the end of the previous all for one, and I was looking forward to both teams playing the same character. Fun though.
Even with both teams using the same champion it was pretty unbalanced, it's not just the champion picks that come into it.
True that.
what does "join the attack of the clones" mean??????????????????????????????????? is this a star wars reference because I know the next star wars movie is coming out, but i dont understand it ???????

The game mode is all about multiple people using the same champ, as if that champ had been cloned (which would've made more sense if Riot didn't ditch the summoner lore). It probably is a reference to Star Wars but not because of the new movie coming out, Riot doesn't need a reason to make a reference.
REKCEPTION
{{champion:203}} IS THE BEST CHAMP EV{{item:3153}} ER YAYA JUST BUY THESE ITEMS THEN GGWP {{item:3153}} {{item:3072}} }} {{item:3031}} {{item:3087}} {{item:3006}} {{item:3078}}
{{champion:223}} {{champion:223}} {{champion:223}} ception
Had 10 Brands..................... the game took 60:59, it was Kellogs ALL {{champion:63}}
Almost impossible to get a game of this because people keep dodging queue if they don't get the champ they want.  Needs to be harsh, HARSH penalties for queue dodgers.

Does this mean other {{champion:421}} on the same team can use other team mates tunnels?
#REKCEPTION
but only 1 tunnel at a time after its used it goes on cd
Do I get anything for playing this?{{item:3070}}
Satisfaction?
Probably an Icon like they usually give out in these modes
Sup Rito, Keep Spinning, Good Job!
They should make gamemodes like this permanent in customs so we can get new players more interested in lol (and because i want to play these all year round XD)
noone wants twisted fate
that's because he is cheap and everyone has him.
I like to point out that 5 {{champion:115}} won't do anything to a {{champion:86}} .

Why are they doing this it's so fun why does it have to go
{{champion:62}}
This gave me an idea that aram should be a bit like this. Having every champ in the chance of an aram game, which would be fairer, in case a player plays every champ that he owns.

I hope i don't have to wait another 2 years for this to come again. I love how i can try out new champs. Some look boring, but after i try them, i want to buy them. Im having trouble deciding who to buy, since i can't afford enough.

> NO ICON? RIOT?!
!!!!{{champion:115}} {{champion:115}} {{item:3151}}

Hey riot,
I was just thinking if you could just put on all the game modes permanently? I think it would be great thanks.
Can another Ekko proc a Ekko's w on the same team?
yes
> NO

I think a gamemode they should try and replicate is Hide and Seek on the crystal scar. 
True there are a lot of different variations of rules and such, but thats why Rito has these teams of people to make gamemodes like this; to make them fun and enjoyable for everyone!!! ^_^
Plus the crystal scar has a lot of catching up to do with the other maps, as dominion as a game mode isnt that popular anymore :(

make this and urf temp game modes, like the twisted treeline, or perma in custom, that way people will still play norms a bit, because they get all the urf and this out of their system, but still a fun anf jokeable gamemode
